TunableList.name: cloud_states
TunableList.description: The types of clouds for this weather event.

Tunable.name: end_delay
Tunable.description: Delay in sim minutes before element ends. Used if existing weather is more severe than new weather.

Tunable.name: end_rate
Tunable.description: Rate at which ramp doown occurs. Used if existing weather is more severe than new weather.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: start_delay
Tunable.description: Delay in sim minutes before change starts. Used if new weather is more severe than existing weather.

Tunable.name: start_rate
Tunable.description: Rate at which ramp up occurs. Used if new weather is more severe than existing weather.

TunableVariant.name: prescribed_weather_type
TunableVariant.description: The types of prescribed weather this forecast counts as

Tunable.name: blizzard
Tunable.description: If checked this forecast will be unavailable if blizzard is disabled

Tunable.name: rain
Tunable.description: If checked this forecast will be unavailable if rain is disabled

Tunable.name: snow
Tunable.description: If checked this forecast will be unavailable if snow is disabled

Tunable.name: storm
Tunable.description: If checked this forecast will be unavailable if storm is disabled

Tunable.name: thunder_snow_storms
Tunable.description: If checked this forecast will be unavailable if thunder snow storms are disabled in the options menu.
